name: SVGTextPositioningElement
description: The SVGTextPositioningElement interface is implemented by elements that support attributes that position individual text glyphs. It is inherited by SVGTextElement, SVGTSpanElement, SVGTRefElement and SVGAltGlyphElement.

members.name: SVGTextPositioningElement.x
members.description: Returns an SVGAnimatedLengthList reflecting the x attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGTextPositioningElement.y
members.description: Returns an SVGAnimatedLengthList reflecting the y attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGTextPositioningElement.dx
members.description: Returns an SVGAnimatedLengthList reflecting the dx attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGTextPositioningElement.dy
members.description: Returns an SVGAnimatedLengthList reflecting the dy attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGTextPositioningElement.rotate
members.description: Returns an SVGAnimatedNumberList reflecting the rotate attribute of the given element.
